factoid: Alpátych looked intently at Dron.
Alpátych frowned.
Dron was a model village Elder.
Alpátych had not managed Prince Andrew's estates for twenty years in vain.
Alpátych was a model steward.
Alpátych possessed the faculty of divining the needs and instincts of those he dealt with.
Alpátych understood that Dron’s answers did not express Dron’s personal views but the general mood of the Boguchárovo commune.
The Boguchárovo commune had already carried away Dron.
Dron had acquired property.
Dron was hated by the Boguchárovo commune.
Dron must be hesitating between the masters’ camp and the serfs’ camp.
Alpátych noticed Dron’s hesitation in Dron’s look.
Alpátych moved closer to Dron.
Alpátych said "Now just listen, Drónushka."
Alpátych said "Don’t talk nonsense to me."
Prince Andrew gave Alpátych orders to move all the people away and not leave them with the enemy.
There is an order from the Tsar about moving the people away.
Anyone who stays is a traitor to the Tsar.
Alpátych asked Dron if he hears.
Dron answered "I hear" without lifting his eyes.
Alpátych was not satisfied with Dron's reply.
Alpátych said "Eh, Dron, it will turn out badly!"
Alpátych shook his head.
Dron said "The power is in your hands" sadly.
Alpátych said "Eh, Dron, drop it!"
Alpátych withdrew his hand from his bosom.
Alpátych pointed to the floor at Dron’s feet.
Alpátych said "I can see through you and three yards into the ground under you."
Alpátych gazed at the floor in front of Dron.
Dron was disconcerted.
Dron glanced furtively at Alpátych.
Dron lowered his eyes again.
Alpátych told Dron to drop nonsense and tell people to get ready to leave their homes and go to Moscow and get carts ready for tomorrow morning for the princess’ things.
Alpátych told Dron not to go to any meeting himself.
Alpátych asked Dron if he hears.
Dron was disconcerted.
Dron glanced furtively at Alpátych.
Dron lowered his eyes again.
Alpátych told Dron to drop nonsense and tell people to get ready to leave their homes and go to Moscow and get carts ready for tomorrow morning for the princess’ things.
Alpátych told Dron not to go to any meeting himself.
Alpátych asked Dron if he hears.
Dron fell on his knees.
Dron said "Yákov Alpátych, discharge me! Take the keys from me and discharge me, for Christ’s sake!"
Alpátych cried "Stop that!"
Alpátych repeated "I see through you and three yards under you."
Alpátych had skill in beekeeping.
Alpátych had knowledge of the right time to sow oats.
Alpátych had been able to retain Prince Andrew's favor for twenty years.
Alpátych had gained a reputation of being a wizard.
The power of seeing three yards under a man is considered an attribute of wizards.
Dron got up.
Dron was about to say something.
Alpátych interrupted Dron.
Alpátych asked Dron "What is it you have got into your heads?"
Alpátych asked Dron "What are you thinking of?"
Dron said "What am I to do with the people?"
Dron said "They’re quite beside themselves; I have already told them..."
Alpátych said "'Told them,' I dare say!"
Alpátych asked "Are they drinking?"
Dron said "Quite beside themselves, Yákov Alpátych; they’ve fetched another barrel."
Alpátych said "Well, then, listen! I’ll go to the police officer, and you tell them so, and that they must stop this and the carts must be got ready."
Dron said "I understand."
Alpátych did not insist further.
Alpátych had managed people for a long time.
Alpátych knew that the chief way to make people obey is to show no suspicion that they can possibly disobey.
Alpátych wrung a submissive "I understand" from Dron.
Alpátych contented himself with that.
Alpátych doubted that without the help of troops the carts would not be forthcoming.
Alpátych felt almost certain that without the help of troops the carts would not be forthcoming.
At evening, no carts had been provided.
In the village outside the drink shop, another meeting was being held.
That meeting decided that the horses should be driven out into the woods.
That meeting decided that the carts should not be provided.
Alpátych had his own belongings taken out of the carts which had arrived from Bald Hills.
Alpátych had those horses get ready for the princess’ carriages.
Alpátych went to the police authorities.
